00011 GameWorld::GameWorld(int _level)
00012 {
00013   L = luaL_newstate();
00014   registerLua(L);
00015 
00016   m_entityMgr = new EntityManager();
00017 
00018   m_win = 0;
00019   m_lose = 0;
00020 
00021   m_numberOfRiotersDead = 0;
00022   m_numberOfRiotersHome = 0;
00023   m_activePolice = 0;
00024 
00025   m_resetID = 1;
00026 
00027   // get a different lua level based in input level
00028   switch (_level)
00029   {
00030     case 1 :
00031     {
00032      luabridge::LuaRef startLevel = luabridge::getGlobal(L, "level1");
00033      startLevel();
00034      break;
00035     }
00036     case 2 :
00037     {
00038      luabridge::LuaRef startLevel = luabridge::getGlobal(L, "level2");
00039      startLevel();
00040      break;
00041     }
00042     case 3 :
00043     {
00044      luabridge::LuaRef startLevel = luabridge::getGlobal(L, "level3");
00045      startLevel();
00046      break;
00047     }
00048     case 4 :
00049     {
00050      luabridge::LuaRef startLevel = luabridge::getGlobal(L, "level4");
00051      startLevel();
00052      break;
00053     }
00054     case 5 :
00055     {
00056      luabridge::LuaRef startLevel = luabridge::getGlobal(L, "level5");
00057      startLevel();
00058      break;
00059     }
00060     default :
00061     {
00062      std::cout<<"Error: Invalid level"<<std::endl;
00063      break;
00064     }
00065   }
00066 
00067   // load in the meshes
00068   m_streetMesh = new ngl::Obj(m_streetMeshFile); //Obj for roads, should be tris
00069   m_buildingMesh = new ngl::Obj(m_buildingMeshFile); //Obj for buildings, should be tris
00070   m_streetMesh->createVAO();
00071   m_buildingMesh->createVAO();
00072 
00073   m_cellGraph = new CellGraph(m_cellGraphFile, 1); //Obj for cell graph, must be quads
00074   m_cellGraph->generateWalls();
00075 
00076   m_policeMesh = new ngl::Obj("models/policeMan.obj");
00077   m_rioterMesh = new ngl::Obj("models/rioterMan.obj");
00078   m_treeMesh = new ngl::Obj("models/tree.obj");
00079   m_streetLightMesh = new ngl::Obj("models/streetLight.obj");
00080 
00081   std::vector<ngl::Vec3> wallCentres = m_cellGraph->getWallCentres();
00082   std::vector<ngl::Vec3> wallNormals = m_cellGraph->getWallNormals();
00083   std::vector<int> wallRotations = m_cellGraph->getWallRotations();
00084 
00085   m_policeMesh->createVAO();
00086   m_rioterMesh->createVAO();
00087   m_treeMesh->createVAO();
00088   m_streetLightMesh->createVAO();
00089 
00090   //initialise rioters
00091   for (int i = 0; i < m_initialNumberOfRioters ; ++i)
00092   {
00093   Rioter* newRioter = new Rioter(this, m_rioterMesh);
00094   newRioter->setBoudingRadius(0.5f);
00095   newRioter->setDetectionRadius(3.5f);
00096   newRioter->setHeading(ngl::Vec3(-1+2*((float)rand())/RAND_MAX, 0.f, -1+2*((float)rand())/RAND_MAX));
00097   newRioter->setPos(ngl::Vec3(-25+50*((float)rand())/RAND_MAX, 0.f, -25+50*((float)rand())/RAND_MAX));
00098   m_cellGraph->initializeCells(m_entityMgr->getEntityFromID(newRioter->getID()));
00099   while (newRioter->getCurrentCellID() < 0)
00100   {
00101     newRioter->setPos(ngl::Vec3(-50+100*((float)rand())/RAND_MAX, 0.f, -50+100*((float)rand())/RAND_MAX));
00102     m_cellGraph->initializeCells(m_entityMgr->getEntityFromID(newRioter->getID()));
00103   }
00104   m_rioters.push_back(newRioter);
00105   }
00106   m_numberOfRioters = m_rioters.size();
00107 
00108   // initialise trees
00109   for (int i = 0; i < m_numberOfTrees ; ++i)
00110   {
00111   StaticEntity* newTree = new StaticEntity(this, ngl::Vec3(0,0,0),ngl::Vec3(0.0f,360*((float)rand()/RAND_MAX),0.0f),1.0,obstacleTree,m_treeMesh);
00112   newTree->setPos(ngl::Vec3(-25+50*((float)rand())/RAND_MAX, 0.f, -25+50*((float)rand())/RAND_MAX));
00113   m_cellGraph->initializeCells(m_entityMgr->getEntityFromID(newTree->getID()));
00114   while (newTree->getCurrentCellID() < 0)
00115   {
00116     newTree->setPos(ngl::Vec3(-50+100*((float)rand())/RAND_MAX, 0.f, -50+100*((float)rand())/RAND_MAX));
00117     m_cellGraph->initializeCells(m_entityMgr->getEntityFromID(newTree->getID()));
00118   }
00119   m_obstacles.push_back(newTree);
00120   }
00121 
00122   int numberOfWalls = wallCentres.size();
00123 
00124   //pick random streetlight positions
00125   int sample[m_numberOfStreetLights];
00126   std::vector<int> choices;
00127   int choice;
00128 
00129   for (int i=0; i<numberOfWalls; i++)
00130   {
00131     choices.push_back(i);
00132   }
00133 
00134   srand (time(NULL));
00135 
00136   assert (m_numberOfStreetLights<=numberOfWalls && "too many streetlights for the map size!");
00137 
00138   for(int i=0;i<m_numberOfStreetLights;i++)
00139   {
00140   do
00141   {
00142     choice = rand() % numberOfWalls;
00143   }
00144   while((choices[choice]==-1));
00145 
00146   choices[choice]=-1; // prevents duplicate choices
00147   sample[i] = choice;
00148 
00149   }
00150 
00151   for (int i = 0; i < m_numberOfStreetLights ; i++)
00152   {
00153   StaticEntity* newStreetLight = new StaticEntity(this, wallCentres[sample[i]]+(0.3*wallNormals[sample[i]]), ngl::Vec3(0.0f,wallRotations[sample[i]],0.0f), 0.2, obstacleStreetLight, m_streetLightMesh);
00154   m_cellGraph->initializeCells(m_entityMgr->getEntityFromID(newStreetLight->getID()));
00155   m_obstacles.push_back(newStreetLight);
00156   }
00157 
00158   m_numberOfObstacles = m_obstacles.size();
00159 }

00168 GameWorld::~GameWorld()
00169 {
00170   lua_close(L);
00171   BOOST_FOREACH(Rioter *r, m_rioters)
00172   {
00173     delete r;
00174   }
00175   m_rioters.clear();
00176   BOOST_FOREACH(Squad *s, m_squads)
00177   {
00178     delete s;
00179   }
00180   m_squads.clear();
00181   BOOST_FOREACH(StaticEntity *o, m_obstacles)
00182   {
00183     delete o;
00184   }
00185   m_obstacles.clear();
00186   BOOST_FOREACH(Rioter *r, m_deadRioters)
00187   {
00188     delete r;
00189   }
00190   m_deadRioters.clear();
00191   BOOST_FOREACH(Squad *s, m_deadSquads)
00192   {
00193     delete s;
00194   }
00195   m_deadSquads.clear();
00196 
00197   delete m_streetMesh;
00198   delete m_buildingMesh;
00199 
00200   m_entityMgr->clearMap();
00201   delete m_entityMgr;
00202 }

00204 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00205 void GameWorld::Update(double _timeElapsed, double _currentTime)
00206 {
00207   //check for deaths/homes
00208   m_numberOfSquads = m_squads.size();
00209   m_numberOfRioters = m_rioters.size();
00210 
00211   for(int i=0; i<m_numberOfRioters; i++)
00212   {
00213     Rioter* currentRioter = m_rioters[i];
00214     std::vector<float> map_bounds = m_cellGraph->getMapBounds();
00215 
00216     //check for rioter deaths
00217     if(currentRioter->getHealth()<=0.f)
00218     {
00219       currentRioter->death();
00220       m_entityMgr->removeEntity(dynamic_cast<BaseGameEntity*>(currentRioter));
00221       m_deadRioters.push_back(currentRioter);
00222 
00223       m_rioters.erase(m_rioters.begin()+i);
00224       m_numberOfRioters--;
00225       m_numberOfRiotersDead ++;
00226       i--;
00227     }
00228 
00229     //check for when rioters have left the map
00230     else if(currentRioter->getPos().m_z <= map_bounds[0] ||
00231             currentRioter->getPos().m_z >= map_bounds[1] ||
00232             currentRioter->getPos().m_x <= map_bounds[2] ||
00233             currentRioter->getPos().m_x >= map_bounds[3])
00234 
00235     {
00236       m_entityMgr->removeEntity(dynamic_cast<BaseGameEntity*>(currentRioter));
00237       m_deadRioters.push_back(currentRioter);
00238       m_rioters.erase(m_rioters.begin()+i);
00239       m_numberOfRioters--;
00240       m_numberOfRiotersHome++;
00241       i--;
00242     }
00243   }
00244 
00245   //check for squad deaths
00246 
00247   for(int i = 0; i < m_numberOfSquads; i++)
00248   {
00249     Squad* currentSquad = m_squads[i];
00250 
00251     if (currentSquad->getSquadSize() <= 0)
00252     {
00253       m_deadSquads.push_back(currentSquad);
00254       m_entityMgr->removeEntity(currentSquad);
00255       m_squads.erase(m_squads.begin()+i);
00256       m_numberOfSquads--;
00257       i--;
00258     }
00259     else
00260     {
00261       m_activePolice -= m_squads[i]->checkDeaths();
00262     }
00263   }
00264 
00265   // update cells
00266 
00267   m_cellGraph->clearCells();
00268   std::map<int,BaseGameEntity*> myMap = m_entityMgr->getEntityMap();
00269 
00270   for (std::map<int,BaseGameEntity*>::const_iterator it = myMap.begin(); it != myMap.end(); ++it)
00271   {
00272     //Adds entities to cells and cell ID to entities
00273     m_cellGraph->updateCells(it->second);
00274   }
00275 
00276   for (std::map<int,BaseGameEntity*>::const_iterator it = myMap.begin(); it != myMap.end(); ++it)
00277   {
00278     //Adds entity neighbours:
00279     if (it->second->getCurrentCellID() >= 0)
00280     {
00281       m_cellGraph->addEntities(it->second);
00282     }
00283   }
00284 
00285 
00286   // call rioter and squad updates
00287   m_numberOfRioters = m_rioters.size();
00288   for(unsigned int a=0; a<m_numberOfRioters; ++a)
00289   {
00290     Rioter* currentRioter = m_rioters[a];
00291     currentRioter->update(_timeElapsed, _currentTime);
00292   }
00293 
00294   m_numberOfSquads = m_squads.size();
00295   for(unsigned int a=0; a<m_numberOfSquads; ++a)
00296   {
00297     Squad* currentSquad = m_squads[a];
00298     currentSquad->update(_timeElapsed, _currentTime);
00299   }
00300 
00301   // check for win/lose states
00302   if(m_numberOfRiotersHome >= m_numberOfRiotersHomeToWin)
00303   {
00304     m_win = 1;
00305   }
00306   if(m_numberOfRiotersDead >= m_numberOfRiotersDeadToLose)
00307   {
00308     m_lose = 1;
00309   }
00310   if(m_availablePolice <= 0 && m_activePolice <= 0)
00311   {
00312     m_lose = 1;
00313   }
00314 }

00316 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00317 void GameWorld::loadMatricesToShader(ngl::Camera *_cam, ngl::Mat4 _mouseGlobalTX)
00318 {
00319   ngl::ShaderLib *shader=ngl::ShaderLib::instance();
00320 
00321   ngl::Mat4 MV;
00322   ngl::Mat4 MVP;
00323   ngl::Mat3 normalMatrix;
00324   ngl::Mat4 M;
00325 
00326   M=_mouseGlobalTX;
00327   MV=  M*_cam->getViewMatrix();
00328   MVP= M*_cam->getVPMatrix();
00329   normalMatrix=MV;
00330   normalMatrix.inverse();
00331   shader->setShaderParamFromMat4("MV",MV);
00332   shader->setShaderParamFromMat4("MVP",MVP);
00333   shader->setShaderParamFromMat3("normalMatrix",normalMatrix);
00334   shader->setShaderParamFromMat4("M",M);
00335 }

00337 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00338 void GameWorld::draw(ngl::Camera* _cam, ngl::Mat4 _mouseGlobalTX)
00339 {
00340   ngl::Material a(ngl::Colour(0.2f,0.2f,0.2f, 1.0), ngl::Colour(0.32f,0.31f,0.3f, 1.), ngl::Colour(0.77391f,0.77391f,0.77391f, 1.0));
00341   a.setSpecularExponent(20.f);
00342   a.loadToShader("material");
00343   loadMatricesToShader(_cam, _mouseGlobalTX);
00344   m_streetMesh->draw();
00345 
00346   ngl::Material b(ngl::Colour(0.2f,0.2f,0.2f, 1.0), ngl::Colour(0.45f,0.45f,0.45f, 1.), ngl::Colour(0.77391f,0.77391f,0.77391f, 1.0));
00347   b.setSpecularExponent(20.f);
00348   b.loadToShader("material");
00349   loadMatricesToShader(_cam, _mouseGlobalTX);
00350   m_buildingMesh->draw();
00351 
00352   for(unsigned int a=0; a<m_numberOfObstacles; ++a)
00353   {
00354     StaticEntity* currentObstacle = m_obstacles[a];
00355     currentObstacle->draw(_cam, _mouseGlobalTX);
00356   }
00357 
00358   for(unsigned int a=0; a<m_numberOfRioters; ++a)
00359   {
00360     Rioter* currentRioter = m_rioters[a];
00361     currentRioter->draw(_cam, _mouseGlobalTX);
00362   }
00363 
00364   m_numberOfSquads = m_squads.size();
00365 
00366   for(unsigned int a=0; a<m_numberOfSquads; ++a)
00367   {
00368     Squad* currentSquad = m_squads[a];
00369     currentSquad->draw(_cam, _mouseGlobalTX);
00370     if(currentSquad->getSquadState() == squadMove)
00371     {
00372       currentSquad->drawTarget(_cam, _mouseGlobalTX);
00373     }
00374   }
00375 
00376 
00377 }

00379 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00380 void GameWorld::createSquad(int _size)
00381 {
00382     if (m_availablePolice - _size < 0)
00383     {
00384       std::cout<<"Not enough police available!"<<std::endl;
00385     }
00386     else
00387     {
00388       Squad* newSquad = new Squad(this, _size, m_policeStation, 0.5f, m_policeMesh);
00389       m_squads.push_back(newSquad);
00390 
00391       m_activePolice += _size;
00392       m_availablePolice -= _size;
00393     }
00394 }

00397 void GameWorld::squadTarget(Squad* _selectedSquad, ngl::Vec3 _target)
00398 {
00399   if(m_cellGraph->posIsInCell(_target))
00400   {
00401     _selectedSquad->setTarget(_target);
00402   }
00403 }

00406 {

00408 }

00410 void GameWorld::registerLua(lua_State* _L)
00411 {
00412   // Set up LUA state
00413   luaL_dofile(_L, "lua/GameWorld.lua");
00414   luaL_openlibs(_L);
00415 
00416   luabridge::getGlobalNamespace(_L)
00417     .beginClass<GameWorld>("GameWorld")
00418       .addProperty("m_initialNumberOfRioters", &GameWorld::getInitialNumberOfRioters, &GameWorld::setInitialNumberOfRioters)
00419       .addProperty("m_availablePolice", &GameWorld::getAvailablePolice, &GameWorld::setAvailablePolice)
00420       .addProperty("m_numberOfTrees", &GameWorld::getNumberOfTrees, &GameWorld::setNumberOfTrees)
00421       .addProperty("m_numberOfStreetLights", &GameWorld::getNumberOfStreetLights, &GameWorld::setNumberOfStreetLights)
00422       .addProperty("m_cellGraphFile", &GameWorld::getCellGraphFile, &GameWorld::setCellGraphFile)
00423       .addProperty("m_numberOfRiotersDeadToLose", &GameWorld::getNumberOfRiotersDeadToLose, &GameWorld::setNumberOfRiotersDeadToLose)
00424       .addProperty("m_numberOfRiotersHomeToWin", &GameWorld::getNumberOfRiotersHomeToWin, &GameWorld::setNumberOfRiotersHomeToWin)
00425       .addProperty("m_streetMeshFile", &GameWorld::getStreetMeshFile, &GameWorld::setStreetMeshFile)
00426       .addProperty("m_buildingMeshFile", &GameWorld::getBuildingMeshFile, &GameWorld::setBuildingMeshFile)
00427       .addFunction("setPoliceStation", &GameWorld::setPoliceStation)
00428       .addFunction("addProtestPosition", &GameWorld::addProtestPosition)
00429     .endClass();
00430 
00431   luabridge::push(L, this);
00432   lua_setglobal(L, "gameWorld");
00433 }
